DOC.brief_summary: According to traditional Chinese medical theories, a variety of acupuncture formulas can treat diseases such as pain. For example, stimulating acupoints either local or distal to the pain site has been proposed under some conditions. We hypothesize that stimulating acupoints contralateral to the pain site can successfully treat chronic shoulder pain.
DOC.brief_title: Contralateral Acupuncture in the Treatment of Chronic Shoulder Pain
